title: Reorder and update tracklist on Music page

Dropped On The Scene, 3. Fire In My Wires, 4. I Was the Spark, 5. Markdown Magic, 6. Hvem er Tasten?, 7. Code Rush, 8. Binær Hjerte, 9. Glowing Stream, 10. Agents of Chaos, 11. I and I… born of code…

quotes: Dropper on the scene as number 2
change name of nr 4. to 'I Was the Spark'
add 'Markdown Magic as nr 5 and move the others down

Track order matches: Unbreakable Signal, Dropped On The Scene, Fire In My Wires, I Was the Spark, Markdown Magic, Hvem er Tasten?, Code Rush, Binær Hjerte, Glowing Stream, Agents of Chaos, I and I… born of code…

constraints: Do not change any backend logic or data models
